lines.text: DUMMY
n is a new integer variable
create integers max = 0 and min = 10000020
declare integer arrays a , b and c with 110 elements
read standard input to n
for i = 0 to n exclusive , read user input to a [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { cin >> a [ i ] ; }

lines.text: DUMMY
for i = 0 to n exclusive incrementing i
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: if i is greater than 0
change b [ i - 1 ] to a [ i ] - a [ i - 1 ]
if max is less than b [ i - 1 ] , set max to b [ i - 1 ]
lines.code: if ( max < b [ i - 1 ] ) max = b [ i - 1 ] ;

lines.text: DUMMY
DUMMY
for integer i = 0 to n - 1 exclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ )

lines.text: if i is less than n - 2
set c [ i ] to b [ i ] + b [ i + 1 ]
if min is greater than c [ i ] , change min to c [ i ]
lines.code: if ( min > c [ i ] ) min = c [ i ] ;

lines.text: DUMMY
DUMMY
print max if max > min , else print min
lines.code: max > min ? cout << max << endl : cout << min << endl ;
